channel.title: Summit County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures
channel.description: Recent content in Summit County|Utah|United States on Roadsign Pictures

item.title: Echo Road at I-84/UT-65
item.description: Echo Road at I-84/UT-65 (Exit 115) in Henefer. Use I-84 west for Morgan; I-84 east for Coalville. Continue on roadway for UT-65/Henefer.

item.title: Echo Dam Road at I-80 West
item.description: Echo Dam Road at I-80 West (Exit 169). Use I-80 west for Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 169 Offramp
item.description: I-80 East on Exit 169 offramp. Turn left for Echo.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 169
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 169 - Echo.

item.title: Ramp Between I-84 East and I-80 East Approaching Exit 169
item.description: Ramp between I-84 East and I-80 East approaching Exit 169 - Echo.

item.title: End I-84 East at I-80
item.description: End I-84 East at I-80 in Summit County. Use right lane for I-80 West; left lane for I-80 East.

item.title: I-84 East - Elevation 5462 Feet
item.description: Elevation 5462 approaching the eastern end of I-84. There is also an elevation sign at the Idaho-Utah state line on I-84.

item.title: End I-84 East at I-80
item.description: End I-84 East at I-80. Exit 120A - I-80 East/Cheyenne (Wyoming); Exit 120B - I-80 West/Salt Lake City.

item.title: I-84 East - Distance Marker
item.description: Last distance marker on I-84 eastbound. Distance to Evanston (Wyoming) and Cheyenne (Wyoming). Both destinations via I-80 eastbound.

item.title: End UT-65 North at I-84 (Exit 115)
item.description: End UT-65 North at I-84 (Exit 115) in Henefer. Use I-84 East to I-80 junction (next exit). Continue over freeway for Echo (via County Road) and Morgan (via I-84 West).

item.title: UT-65 North - To I-80/I-84
item.description: UT-65 North (Main St.) - To I-80/I-84 in Henefer.

item.title: UT-65 North at UT-86 - To I-84/I-80
item.description: UT-65 North at UT-86 East (Main St.). Turn left for UT-86 West to I-84 West. Turn right to continue north on UT-65 for I-84 East and I-80.

item.title: UT-65 North Approaching UT-86
item.description: UT-65 North Approaching UT-86 in Henefer.

item.title: US-40 East/US-189 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on US-40 East/US-189 South. Distance to Heber City, Duchesne, and Denver (Colorado).

item.title: US-40 East/US-189 South - Exit 2
item.description: US-40 East/US-189 South at Exit 2 - Silver Summit.

item.title: US-40 East/US-189 South - Summit County
item.description: First US-40 and US-189 shields eastbound in Summit County.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 146 Offramp
item.description: I-80 West - Exit 146 offramp. Merge left for Silver Creek Road. Merge right for US-40 East/US-189 South/Heber/Vernal.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 146
item.description: I-80 East at Exit 146 - US-40 East/Heber City/Vernal. This is the western end of US-40.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 141
item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 141 - Jeremy Ranch/Pinebrook.

item.title: I-80 East - Summit County
item.description: Entering Summit County on I-80 East at Parleys Summit - 7120 Feet. This is the highest point along I-80 in the state of Utah.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 145
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 145 - US-40 East/Heber/Provo. This is the western end of US-40.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 146
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 146 - US-40 East/Heber/Provo. The sky is hazy from all the western fires when this was taken. This is the western end of US-40.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 155
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 155 - UT-32 South/Wanship/Kamas.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 162
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 162 - UT-280 East/Coalville. The Weber River is in the background. Coalville is the county seat of Summit County.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 162
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 162 - UT-280 East/Hoytsville/Coalville.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 162
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 162 - UT-280 East/Coalville.

item.title: I-80 West Approaching View Area
item.description: I-80 West approaching View Area (166). Notice the exit tab area of the sign only has a number, not an EXIT text.

item.title: I-84 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-84 west. Distance to Henefer, Morgan, and Ogden.

item.title: I-84 West - Utah
item.description: First shield on I-84 westbound.

item.title: I-80 West at I-84
item.description: I-80 west at I-84 junction. Use Exit 168 for I-84 West/Ogden; continue west on I-80 for Salt Lake.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 168
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 168 - I-84 West/Ogden. This is the eastern end of I-84.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 169
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 169 - Echo.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 169
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 169 - Echo.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 170
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 170 - Rest Area.

item.title: I-80 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-80 west for next three exits - Rest Area, Echo, and I-84.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 187
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 187 - Fawcett. This exit was renamed from Ranch Exit in the last few years.

item.title: Access Road at I-80 (Exit 191)
item.description: Access Road at I-80 (Exit 191 - Wahsatch). The I-80 east shield is missing.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 191
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 191 - Wahsatch.

item.title: I-80 West - Elevation 6860 Feet
item.description: I-80 west Elevation 6860 Feet. Many highways entering Utah have the elevation listed at or near the state line.

item.title: I-80 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-80 west. Distance to Echo, Coalville, and Salt Lake City. This is the first distance marker on I-80 westbound in Utah.

item.title: I-80 West - Summit County
item.description: First I-80 West shield in Utah, just west of the Wyoming border.

item.title: I-80 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-80 west. Distance to Salt Lake and Reno (Nevada).

item.title: US-40 West/US-189 North - Summit County
item.description: US-40 West/US-189 North in Summit County

item.title: UT-248 West at US-40
item.description: UT-248 West at US-40 (Exit 4) in Summit County.

item.title: UT-248 West at US-40
item.description: UT-248 West at US-40 in Summit County. Use US-40 west for Jct. I-80; US-40 east for Heber City.

item.title: UT-248 West - Summit County
item.description: Summit County on UT-248 west.

item.title: UT-32 North at UT-248
item.description: UT-32 north at UT-248 west in Kamas.

item.title: UT-32 East Approaching UT-248 South
item.description: UT-32 south approaching UT-248. Use UT-248 for Park City and Salt Lake. Continue south on UT-32 for Heber City and Francis.

item.title: End UT-150 West at UT-32/To UT-248
item.description: End UT-150 West at UT-32/To UT-248 in Kamas. Turn left for UT-32 South to UT-248.

item.title: End UT-150 West at UT-32
item.description: End UT-150 West at UT-32 in Kamas. Use UT-32 north for Henefer; UT-32 south for Heber.

item.title: UT-150 West - Summit County
item.description: UT-150 West in Summit County

item.title: UT-150 South - Bald Mountain Pass
item.description: UT-150 South on (Bald Mountain Pass) Elevation 10,759 Feet.

item.title: UT-150 South at Aspen Drive
item.description: UT-150 south at Aspen Drive/Manor/Uinta/Wilderness Acres.

item.title: UT-150 South - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on UT-150 south. Distance to Mirror Lake and Kamas.

item.title: UT-150 South - Welcome To Utah
item.description: Welcome To Utah on UT-150 South. Elevation 7810 Feet. The mile marker of 23.56 is from Wyoming WY-150.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 140
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 140 - Parleys Summit.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 141
item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 141 - Jeremy Ranch.

item.title: I-80 West - Distance Marker
item.description: Distance marker on I-80 west. Distance to Salt Lake and Reno (Nevada).

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 145
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 145 - UT-224 South/Kimball Jct./Park City.

item.title: End US-40 at I-80
item.description: End US-40 at I-80. Merge right for US-40 (Exit 1) - I-80 East/Cheyenne (WY)/Silver Creek Road. Use left lanes for I-80 West/Salt Lake. This is the western end of US-40.

item.title: US-40 West - Exits 2 and 1
item.description: US-40 West approaching Exit 2 - Silver Summit. Approaching Exit 2 - I-80/Cheyenne (Wyoming)/Salt Lake.

item.title: US-40 West - Exit 4
item.description: US-40 West at Exit 4 - Park City/Kamas.

item.title: US-40 West - Summit County
item.description: Entering Summit County on US-40 west.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 112
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 112 - UT-86 East/Henefer.

item.title: I-84 West - Exit 115
item.description: I-84 west at Exit 115 - UT-65 South/Henefer/Echo.

item.title: I-84 West - Utah
item.description: First shield on I-84 west. The picture is fuzzy, but the shield contains the word UTAH.

item.title: I-80 West at I-84
item.description: I-80 west at I-84 junction. Use Exit 168 for I-84 West/Ogden; continue west on I-80 for Salt Lake.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 168 - I-84 West/Ogden.

item.description: I-80 west at Exit 169 - Echo.

item.title: I-80 West - Exit 170
item.description: I-80 west at Exit 170 - Rest Area/Tourist Info Center.

item.description: I-80 west at Exit 178 - Emery.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 185 - Castle Rock.

item.description: I-80 west approaching Exit 187 - Ranch Exit.

item.description: I-80 west at Exit 191 - Wahsatch.

item.title: I-80 East/US-189 North
item.description: I-80 East/US-189 North at the Utah-Wyoming State Line. The official welcome sign is located after the Wyoming Port of Entry which is located directly on the state line. This is the only indication of the state line.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 191
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 191 - Wahsatch. This is the last Utah exit on I-80 east.

item.description: I-80 east at Exit 187 - Ranch Exit.

item.description: I-80 east at Exit 185 - Castle Rock.

item.description: I-80 east at Exit 169 - Echo.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 168
item.description: I-80 East at Exit 168 - I-84 West/Ogden. I-80 continues east towards Cheyenne. This is the eastern end of I-84.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 162
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 162 - Coalville. Coalville is the county seat of Summit County.

item.description: I-80 East at Exit 146 - US-40 East/Heber/Vernal. This is the western end of US-40.

item.description: UT-32 east at UT-35 east in Francis. Turn left to continue east on UT-32 to I-80.

item.description: UT-32 south at UT-35 east.

item.description: UT-32 south approaching UT-35 east to Woodland.

item.description: UT-32 south at UT-248 east to Park City and Salt Lake.

item.description: UT-32 south approaching UT-248.

item.description: UT-32 south To UT-248 south of UT-150.

item.description: UT-32 south to Provo and Heber City at UT-150 east to Mirror Lake.

item.title: US-40 West at Exit 2. Approaching I-80.
item.description: US-40 west at Exit 2 - Sliver Summit. Approaching I-80. Use I-80 east to Cheyenne (Wyoming); I-80 west to Salt Lake. US-40 west ends at I-80.

item.description: I-80 east at Exit 145 - UT-224 South/Kimball Junction/Park City exit.

item.description: I-80 east approaching Exit 148 - US-40/Heber/Vernal on I-80 East, Summit County.

item.description: I-80 east Exit 197 - Port of Entry. This is the ramp to the Wyoming Port of Entry, near the Utah-Wyoming line.
